content:
It turns out @Linda posted photos of ACTUAL COOKIES during Virtual Cookie Break, and it drove us nuts. So I made a zoom background out of the mix she used. Others are retaliating. It seems obvious that we're going to rapidly evolve into eating real cookies together. Prepare.
image.png

Heads up, everyone - several of us saw Linda's IRL cookies yesterday (and recipes posted by others) and decided there's no reason we can't ALL bring fresh baked cookies to the occasion. It's on - the new standard!

I for one will have some. Except it seems they came out of the oven and cooled too soon, so some more will need to be baked, um.
